ApiKey.Name: Google Gemini API Key
ApiKey.Hint: Your API key from Google AI Studio (https://ai.google.dev/). Required to use the AI Solo Adventure Narrator.

Model.Name: Gemini Model
Model.Hint: FREE TIER: Flash (10 req/min) or Flash-8B (15 req/min) are ideal. Pro (2 req/min) requires paid account or 30s wait between actions.

Temperature.Name: AI Creativity (Temperature)
Temperature.Hint: Controls creativity in narratives. Lower values (0.5) are more consistent, higher values (1.2) are more creative and unpredictable. Recommended: 0.8-0.9 for adventures.

MaxTokens.Name: Maximum Narrative Length
MaxTokens.Hint: Maximum number of tokens (words) in responses. MINIMUM RECOMMENDED: 2048 for short narratives, 4096+ for rich solo adventures and detailed NPCs.

ChatNotifications.Name: Show Narratives in Chat
ChatNotifications.Hint: Display AI narratives as chat messages in the main chat window.

PlayerCommands.Name: Allow Player Chat Commands
PlayerCommands.Hint: Allow all players to use /aidm and /dm chat commands, not just the GM.
